page.title: 11CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are seven groups or clubs which meet in the school. {BROWNIES:-}They meet every Tuesday in the gym hall. There are two 'sixes' the Elves and the Kelpies.{GUIDES:- They meet in the Arts & Crafts Room. Their 'patrols' are the Kingfishers and the Swallows.{JU-JITSU:-}It's on every Thursday. There are 8 people in the juniors and 5 in the seniors. {BADMINTON:-}Seniors play on Monday & Thursday evenings and the juniors on Mondays after school. It is a winter activity.{TABLE TENNIS:-}Table Tennis is on Thursdays in the winter.{STRINGS {'N' THINGS:-}This is an after school String Orchestra held in the music room on Fridays. The orchestra members rehearse for concerts in Sanday and elsewhere.{PLAYGROUP:-}This is on Mondays in the school for pre-school children.
